attributes.action: reintroduce the death penalty for serious criminal offences (ie murder, serious assault, child abuse, rape, acts of terror) and to ensure that where custodial sentences are appropriate, criminals are denied all rights save for those pertaining to their basic needs (ie food and lodging in return for unpaid labour).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The law abiding community deserve the reassurrance that their freedoms and rights will be protected under law. The law should set the standard and make it clear that wrongdoing will not be tolerated, rather it will be punished. Evil can only prosper if good men do nothing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
